Content: It should be possible to add additional values to conflicts
like public opinion, the opinion of a arbitration panel,
or the decryption of the blueprints for a protected blueprint
(connected to a good that should be monopolized)
to simulate multiple dimensions of the conflict.
If this values cross certain thresholds the conflicts
either change in nature or are decided completely.
They should have a strength modifier describing how important they
So for some conflicts public opinions matters but battle results
They also be able should influence escalation costs and other values.
